name: Ugarit
description: Ugaritic alphabet - The First phonetically based script which was discovered on clay tablets in 1928 , it’s a cuneiform Abjad that’s been used in the center of the literate world [Ugarit] on the Mediterranean coast back between 15th and 13th century BCE, communication became much better, people were able to preserve their knowledge , and it has been adopted to write many languages.
